forecast.name: This Afternoon
forecast.detailedForecast: Rain. Cloudy. High near 64, with temperatures falling to around 53 in the afternoon. Northwest wind around 16 mph, with gusts as high as 26 mph. Chance of precipitation is 90%. New rainfall amounts between a tenth and quarter of an inch possible.

forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.detailedForecast: Rain before 1am. Mostly cloudy, with a low around 43. West northwest wind 10 to 17 mph, with gusts as high as 30 mph. Chance of precipitation is 90%. New rainfall amounts between a tenth and quarter of an inch possible.

nubsNob.comments: Thank you for making 2024-25 another great season! Stay tuned for updates, we look forward to having you back next year.
